name: Diapers
description: Family is a low income family with 7 kids. Mother is the main breadwinner while father is the caregiver. She usually earns enough for the family, and the family is on financial assistance as well. However, as mother has been sick this month and was even hospitalized (overwork), the family is experiecing financial difficulties (mum works as a sales person and if she does not work and earn commision, she does not earn enough for the family). Husband is trying to look for a part-time job, but that will take some time too. FSC has provided them with some emergency cash this month for their basic needs but they need some support for diapers. They have 2 young children still on diapers and it would be helpful if they can get 4 packets of L and XL diapers each for each child (any brand is fine). This should last them for 1 month plus till mother feels better and the family's financial situation stabilises a bit. It would be helpful if they can get a few tins of Lactogen 3 too as the current tins that they have can only last for a few more weeks. Thank you for supporting the family, please feel free to reach out to me through email should you require more information.

passiton.name: Tena Men Active Fit (NOT diapers)

Ideal for mobile men with irritable bladders or slight incontinence, to catch small urinary leaks in case they can’t make it to the toilet in time.

passiton.location: Ardmore, Balmoral, Bukit Timah, Grange Road, Holland Road, Orchard Boulevard, Tanglin

name: Milk
description: Family is a low income family with multiple young children, of which 2 of them are still on milk and diapers. As family is currently facing tight finances and child protection concerns (father also difficulties securing a job due to his health), it has been difficult for the family to get some stable income. Mother is the main caregiver of the young children as they are not in childcare yet. The family would require some milk  support in the mean time as FSC work with them in exploring childcare placement and managing the child protection concerns. It would be helpful if a donor can provide 4-6 tins of 1.8kg Lactogen 3. Please feel free to email me for more information, thank you!
